list: This semi-gloss sheen is a lustrous, durable finish that is perfect for areas that require frequent cleaning and superior resistance to moisture; ideal for entryway doors, garage doors and accent trim
Our cleanest, purest white pairs perfectly with every color
Strong finish gives outstanding durability and weather resistance
Gives excellent hide in fewer coats

specs.title: For Use on Barn and Fence
For Use on Porches and Floors

reviews.title: "DOUBLE DOOR MAKE OVER"
reviews.text: First review ever.  My son didn't think that the double doors could be saved. They were in rough shape. ( sorry, forgot to take before pic) So we removed them, removed the old tan paint, sanded and I used a coat of primer. Sanded again. I used two coats of Valspar Satin Perfect White. I painted the already primed single door with two coats also. Love Valspar paint...Always my first choice
reviews.author: Lj

reviews.title: "Best paint on trim and cabinents"
reviews.text: This is the best paint i ever used. I used it on oak cabinents and trim wood and i am so pleased. I put two coats and its the brightest white you will ever find and i smudged the cabinent doors when i hung them back up and i took a damp cloth wiped it right off. I love it and its cheaper than the cabinent paint. I still havent finished it. Putting down new flooring tomorrow and hadnt finished putting all the cabinent hardware on.  I give it a 5 star. Love it love it.
reviews.author: Lois

reviews.title: "Painting the barn"
reviews.text: After a reviewing Valspar, I picked a winner! Rolls on great, first coat was smooth and cover without all the drippings. Second coat was a breeze.  Next painting project will be with Valspar!
reviews.author: bigbear

reviews.title: "Very thick but exactly what I was looking for"
reviews.text: I used this for my baseboards I was installing. I was surprised at how thick the paint was and it definitely took some time to mix. Once it was thoroughly mixed it went on smooth and dried quickly. I was very happy with the final product and it seems very robust. A little goes a long way with this stuff. If you're looking for a good thick quality paint this is the way to go
reviews.author: HC

reviews.title: "As Advertised"
reviews.text: I used this all in one paint/primer on bare wood. Total coverage was achieved in two coats. Clean up was a snap as well.
reviews.author: RockBobM

reviews.title: "covers well"
reviews.text: great paint - last time i used this it lasted 13 yrs - in the sun
reviews.author: rich

reviews.title: "Exterior Paint"
reviews.text: This paint goes on smooth and looks so nice after it dries. I painted the exterior of my house last year and it still looks like I painted it yesterday. I had to finish up some areas that I didn't get last year and you cannot tell the difference. I highly recommend this exterior paint to anyone. I will be painting my garage doors with this color once I get the other areas done. You won't be disappointed!
reviews.author: Laura

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Glidergal

reviews.title: "Great exterior paint."
reviews.text: I've used Valspar for years and have always found it to cover well the first coat.  For the price, Valspar is a great paint for my outdoor projects.
reviews.author: shveenya

reviews.title: "100% satisfied"
reviews.text: I used this exterior paint on window and door frames, soffits and facial boards. One coat after scraping old loose paint and the jobs was done.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Perfect paint to cover old paint"
reviews.text: I am very happy with the job that this paint did to cover my old front porch! It definitely helped to give my porch the facelift it needed, brightened the area, and covered all of the spots I needed it to. I always choose Valspar!
reviews.author: Darce

reviews.title: "covverage"
reviews.text: This exterior paint does a good cover in one coat - it's a primer so that helps a lot.
reviews.author: Anne

reviews.title: "Perfect White"
reviews.text: Once applied and dried, our home felt like a winter wonderland.
reviews.author: LadyRaRa

reviews.title: "WOW!!"
reviews.text: Paint and primer in one that does what it suppose to..excellent coverage on already painted/dirty interior doors.
reviews.author: Steven

reviews.title: "Nice paint"
reviews.text: Not terribly expensive and it's nice exterior paint. Would recommend. I like the Valspar brand paint.
reviews.author: Markus

reviews.title: "Excellent coverage"
reviews.text: I wished I knew about this before we painted the entire upstairs in a different kind of paint. This paint is amazing and covered with just one coat. The price is very reasonable too.
reviews.author: BrownEyedGirl68

reviews.title: "window trim"
reviews.text: It had an inch of fluid on top, mixing it took some time. It was thick after mixing well.It covered well after 2 coats and dried fast. Windows look great.
reviews.author: lookinggood

reviews.title: "Really, really white"
reviews.text: I got this for a project on the front porch.  My husband used it to paint a new stairway handrail and posts from the porch to the sidewalk.  It's SO white I really love it.  I hope now it will stand up to the weather.  The only complaint I have is this makes our white trim look dingy. I'm glad we have a lot of it left, and I know where to get more.
reviews.author: MaryMary

reviews.title: "Valspar Semi-gloss white paint"
reviews.text: My wife and I are really sold on this product.  We have been using it for years to touch up our white wooden trims around our house, inside and outside.  When used correctly it covers everything in one coat.  The Semi-gloss paint allows us to wash of the dirt without damaging the paint.  A really great product and would recommend it to any one.
reviews.author: George

reviews.title: "Happy paint"
reviews.text: First time buying this brand of paint. I can say it was a great experiencing the smoothness of the paint and easy to apply. The salesman and Lowe's did a great job explaining the paint! I think If not for him I just might have went to Sherwin Williams! I have a lot of paintingOn my wife todo list! Lowe's might be the way to go.
reviews.author: Lhsavage

reviews.title: "Valspar Perfect White Exterior Paint—great product"
reviews.text: I used this product to paint the framing and rails of a deck. Great coverage. Very thick paint. Used a sprayer and had to keep pressure up but performed flawlessly. Will buy more to paint larger section of our deck.
reviews.author: Kmac

reviews.title: "Clean smooth finish."
reviews.text: This paint goes on easy, also seems to seal small cracks peeled wallpaper , used only one coat really enjoyed using this product, and I do not like to paint.
reviews.author: Pat

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: I have always used cheap paint brands. Started using valspar and wow does it make a difference. It coveres so much more sg ft and its worth the money!!
reviews.author: Matt

reviews.title: "A little thicker than water"
reviews.text: As the title says this is a little thicker than water.  Had it agitated at store prior to check out and stirred it prior to application. Goes on like water does not cover well.
reviews.author: al6car

reviews.title: "Porch"
reviews.text: We used the paint for seasonal updates and it went on flawless.  Covered the area well without needing a second coat...
reviews.author: Rob

reviews.title: "Amazing Paint"
reviews.text: I have been bouncing around trying different brands and finishes. Valspar wins hands down for price and quality.
reviews.author: Helosrule

reviews.title: "excellent appearance"
reviews.text: Great coverage with minimum paint usage. Painted fascia boards on house. Does not need second coat.
reviews.author: Les

reviews.title: "Great pain"
reviews.text: Decided to paint the outside pillars of my house.  Blown away by the color.  Will purchase again.
reviews.author: Lou28546

reviews.title: "Its paint"
reviews.text: Covered well. Have no idea about life of the paint as we just painted the eaves this weekend
reviews.author: stephanie

reviews.title: "Perfect"
reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Coverage was good as well as straight white coloring.
reviews.author: bratkerri

reviews.title: "Valspar Satin Perfect White Latex Exterior Paint"
reviews.text: A brilliant white that looks well on the trim, versus the light gray wall color.
reviews.author: E

reviews.title: "Great ceiling paint"
reviews.text: Use this exterior inside on my ceiling...does a good job hiding imperfections...
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Good coverage"
reviews.text: White paint over a dark surface, will require a second coat for full coverage.
reviews.author: Bzopff

reviews.text: Extremely thin like applying butter however the finish is very nice.
reviews.author: Amber

reviews.title: "Pretty white"
reviews.text: This white is exactly what it is named, perfect white.
reviews.author: Fefe

reviews.title: "Door and trim paint"
reviews.text: Beautiful bright white. Perfect for doors and trim!
reviews.author: Valerie

reviews.title: "Primer leaves much to be desired"
reviews.text: The paint color is perfect, I used it to paint my kitchen cabinets and the exterior quality will allow me to clean them without worry of ruining the paint. The primer part of the paint did not work very well however. I sanded down the old surfaces even to the point all varnish was off but stains still seemed to show through... Even after the coats. Don't skip the primer with this paint.
reviews.author: Maurena

reviews.title: "White cabinet makeover"
reviews.text: Bought a couple of gallons of this at Lowes. I've since framed my window using craftsman style treatment, This paint is amazing! I'm now moving on to my dreaded 80's oak cabinets. I hate these things with a passion. I did part of the cabinets done with some primer and this paint. It look fantastic so far!!
reviews.author: BianBian

reviews.title: "The paint was a mess to use."
reviews.text: It was too thick and it had an inch of fluid on top, mixing it was a mess. Good thing I had a drop cloth.
reviews.author: JJBL

reviews.title: "seems to be a great product"
reviews.text: So far I believe this to be a very good product. I do think that maybe it should have been shaken at the time of purchase or order. I am not sure if this would have happened by default if it was an in-store purchase or not.
reviews.author: xsnail

reviews.title: "Paint laundry room"
reviews.text: I am always satisfied with the service at the paint department, they make great suggestions based on the project. The attendants are very friendly and courteous. The pint was mixed very good and it was a great finish.
reviews.author: Bobby

reviews.title: "Valspar The perfect White Paint"
reviews.text: I have used several paints over the years & I selected Valspar to repaint my entire home this spring.  My living room, hall & dining room is done and it looks amazing.
reviews.author: Jan

reviews.title: "Dries too fast"
reviews.text: When painting, you can't go more than a couple of feet of trim without it drying. Made it hard to do a large section! Also, had problems get it out of my Purdue.
reviews.author: Charles

reviews.title: "Valspar White"
reviews.text: I purchased this paint for the trim on a shed and it worked awesome! I only applied one coat and it looked good, no need for a second coat!
reviews.author: Shorty

reviews.title: "Bright colors"
reviews.text: We were repainting out bedroom and we got what we needed. Good product. Didn't give 5 stars because I wish it was alittle bit cheaper.
reviews.author: icucar

reviews.title: "Looks great"
reviews.text: Decided to go back and put this on top of some latex paint we had just put on to do the trim a different color. Looks good so far.
reviews.author: Jacob

reviews.title: "trim paint"
reviews.text: I love this paint it goes on like thin caulk and covers in 1 coat .a very good paint for painting the outside of your home
reviews.author: Daviddoright

reviews.title: "Valspar Semi-gloss Perfect White"
reviews.text: Just as the name, this is the perfect white for any of your exterior trim needs.  I would buy this item again.
reviews.author: Tracy

reviews.title: "Perfect White Latex Exterior Paint"
reviews.text: I use this paint to make raise garden bed, it is excellent paint. I would recommend it to family and friends.
reviews.author: kyco

reviews.title: "white paint"
reviews.text: The girl At the paint counter KNEW her stuff and boy was she right. One coat application on ceiling
reviews.author: John

reviews.text: this is the best ceiling paint we have found that works really good
reviews.author: kelly

reviews.title: "Good exterior white paint with primer"
reviews.text: Good exterior paint with primer build in.  Used to paint wooden reindeers for Christmas scene.
reviews.author: Michael

reviews.title: "Lowe's, Laurel, Maryland"
reviews.text: Paint was pre-mixed!  Easy to use from the can to the exterior trim.  Easy to use!
reviews.author: Ken

reviews.title: "Valspar Semi gloss"
reviews.text: The paint went on easy and self smooth before drying. Hardly any brush marks
reviews.author: 350zflyby

reviews.title: "Great quality paint"
reviews.text: This is typical Valspar. Covers very good and goes on without streaking.
reviews.author: rlyon1117

questions.question: "how much square feet one can of paint covers?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: This product has a maximum coverage of 400 sq. ft.

answers.author: TeamValspar
answers.text: The spread rate for this product is approximately 400 square feet per gallon depending on surface porosity.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Yes, this paint can be used on metal.

answers.author: TeamValspar
answers.text: Yes, you can apply this product over properly prepared exterior metal.

questions.question: "I have a gallon of this paint left over. Can it be used inside the house?"
questions.author: Lynne

answers.author: TeamValspar
answers.text: Thank you for your question. We do not recommend the use of our Perfect White Exterior to be used on the interior.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Is Valspar Perfect White Satin Exterior Paint is not recommended for interior use.

questions.question: "Why is this not recommended for interior? Reason for asking,I bought a tiny house that previous owner had started but didn't finish with this paint."
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: TeamValspar
answers.text: Exterior paint is formulated with mildewcides for exterior use only as well as strong odors.

questions.question: "what is the dry time of this paint"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: TeamValspar
answers.text: Dry Time @ 77 °F and 50% Relative Humidity To The Touch: 30–60 minutes Recoat: 2–4 hours Washing: Allow at least 7 days before washing. Use mild detergent and sponge.

questions.question: "Trim around the front door needs painted, but it going to be raining out but the porch covers the door can I still paint"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: TeamValspar
answers.text: We would recommend painting your project once it stops raining. Dry Time @ 77 °F and 50% Relative Humidity To The Touch: 30–60 minutes Recoat: 2–4 hours Washing: Allow at least 7 days before washing. Use mild detergent and sponge. Application Temperature: 50–90° F (10–32° C)

questions.question: "Can this be used on hardy board siding (concrete fiber board)."
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: TeamValspar
answers.text: We do not recommend using this product for your specific project. For further recommendations please contact is directly Monday-Saturday from 8am-6pm EST at 1-877-825-7727 or you can e-mail us at questions@valspar.com.

questions.question: "Can you sand this as if it was just primer to smooth it out?"
questions.author: tbo

answers.author: TeamValspar
answers.text: Yes this product can be sanded and used as a primer as long as the paint that will be going over it is equal to the sheen of the Semi-Gloss Perfect White Paint. Otherwise the Valspar Bonding Primer is recommended before top coating.

questions.question: "Can this be tinted? We are planning on painting a door and have a whole gallon of it unopened."
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: TeamValspar
answers.text: The Valspar Perfect White Exterior Semi-Gloss paint is not a tint base.

questions.question: "Can this be used on a mobile home aluminum door and would we need to do anything before we painted it?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: TeamValspar
answers.text: Yes, this can be used on a mobile home aluminum door. You will need to clean the door thoroughly with an all purpose cleaner and then allow the door to dry before applying the paint.
